Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel in a strategic location”
Reviews.Author: Polpi_viaggiatori
Reviews.Content: hotel clean renewed paid 78 euros night deal regular price twice location strategic close montparnasse underground station crossroad lines ideal reach city quickly hotel heart breton neighborhood excellent crepes

HotelInfo.Name: Berkeley
